_comment: Style Preferences - Style guide, formatting rules, and readability thresholds
_usage: Lisa applies these preferences to all content. Update to match your company style guide.

formattingRules.numberStyle: Spell out one through nine, use digits for 10+

legalDisclaimers.disclaimer: Past performance does not guarantee future results.
Results may vary based on usage and configuration.

readabilityThresholds._comment: Flesch Reading Ease scores (0-100, higher = easier to read). Based on comprehensive testing of all 23 deliverable types.
readabilityThresholds._fallbackChain: 1. Check deliverable acceptanceCriteria for override → 2. Use these user defaults → 3. Fall back to built-in system defaults
readabilityThresholds._guidance: Only override types where your company needs different thresholds. Leave unspecified types to use system defaults.

byDeliverableType._comment_marketing: Marketing deliverables - generally conversational and action-oriented
byDeliverableType._comment_pr: PR deliverables - wide range based on formality needs
byDeliverableType._comment_branding: Branding deliverables - strategic documents need room for nuance
